title.rendered: Maple Avenue’s 5th Grade Parent/Guardian Transition Night on June 17

content.rendered:
Maple Avenue is excited to invite you to our annual transition night on Monday, June 17, at 6 p.m. in the Maple Avenue Auditorium. This is an opportunity for you to come to the middle school building, hear from staff about Maple Avenue, learn about the schedule and how it’s different than the elementary level, learn about the programming and extracurricular opportunities available, and ask questions that you may have about the middle school experience. We will conduct a presentation in the auditorium and then provide an opportunity for you to interact with the different department heads. We do politely ask that you do not bring your students with you to this night as it is just for parents/guardians. 
 
We look forward to seeing you all on June 17!
